name: Shawn Challenge
description: Step into the world of cyber sleuthing! Hunt down suspicious hashes, dig through GitHub for hidden artifacts, and track digital footprints using OSINT and threat intelligence tools. Uncover malicious infrastructure, spot indicators of compromise, and outsmart stealthy cyber actors. Sharpen your investigative skills and become the next generation of digital detectivesâ€”this is real-world cybercrime hunting, and the mission starts now!
